name: The Demon Hunter
description:
Inspired from the classic Telenet "Valis" from mid 80's "Demon Hunter" is an exciting arcade and exploration platformer game created by classics lovers.

Follow the clues and find the Power Stones to face the Evil that plagues your city. Enjoy this game in your mobile or tablet. In this project we prioritize direct game experience without frills on everything else.

We hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we enjoyed developing it!
